body.note: The following procedures should be carried out by an experienced software engineer, familiar with the Maven build process.
body.p: The following sections describe the usage of the RefsetListing Maven mojo in org.dwfa.mojo.refset of the Workbench's term-mojo module. This mojo produces an HTML formatted report of the refset metadata in the Workbench database. The Maven POM should do a “vodb-open” prior to the “refset-listing” goal, followed by a “vodb-close”.
